verses.text: I \w will|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H1732"\w* blessing \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w at|strong="H1732"\w* all \w times|strong="H6440"\w*; \w his|strong="H1732"\w* praise \w will|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H1732"\w* ever \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H8055"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*; \w let|strong="H8055"\w* \w us|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* witnesses together \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* great name.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* searching \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* gave ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H7311"\w* \w me|strong="H7311"\w* free \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* fears.

Let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* eyes \w be|strong="H3068"\w* turned \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* light, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* faces \w will|strong="H3068"\w* not \w be|strong="H3068"\w* shamed.

This poor man's cry \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* gave \w him|strong="H0413"\w* salvation \w from|strong="H6440"\w* all \w his|strong="H6440"\w* troubles.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* angel \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w ever|strong="H2088"\w* watching \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w safe|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w By|strong="H3068"\w* experience \w you|strong="H5439"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* see \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* good; happy \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* man \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* faith \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w him|strong="H5439"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* young lions \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w need|strong="H4270"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* food; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H0853"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* looking \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* every good \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*.

Come, children, give attention \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1875"\w*; \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* teacher \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

What \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* love \w of|strong="H1121"\w* life, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* desire \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* days \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* increased \w so|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* see good?

\w Keep|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* tongue \w from|strong="H0376"\w* evil, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* lips \w from|strong="H0376"\w* words \w of|strong="H0376"\w* deceit.

\w Be|strong="H8193"\w* turned \w from|strong="H3956"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* do good; make \w a|strong="H1696"\w* search for peace, desiring \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* all \w your|strong="H5341"\w* \w heart|strong="H8193"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5493"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H7965"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* Lord \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* upright, \w and|strong="H7965"\w* \w his|strong="H5493"\w* ears \w are|strong="H6213"\w* open \w to|strong="H1245"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* cry.

\w The|strong="H0413"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* do evil, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* take away \w the|strong="H0413"\w* memory \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* cry \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* upright \w comes|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* takes \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* all \w their|strong="H3068"\w* troubles.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* near \w the|strong="H3605"\w* broken-hearted; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* saviour \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* spirits \w are|strong="H3068"\w* crushed down.

Great \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* troubles \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* upright: \w but|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* takes \w him|strong="H0853"\w* safely \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* all.
\w He|strong="H3068"\w* keeps \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* bones: not \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5337"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* broken.

Evil \w will|strong="H3808"\w* put \w an|strong="H8104"\w* end \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sinner, \w and|strong="H7665"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H6106"\w* haters \w of|strong="H3605"\w* righteousness \w will|strong="H3808"\w* come \w to|strong="H8104"\w* destruction.

\w The|strong="H4191"\w* \w Lord|strong="H6662"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* saviour \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* souls \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H8130"\w* servants, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* no \w one|strong="H6662"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* has faith \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H8130"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* shame.
